channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Ripple case: Pro-XRP lawyer tips outright SEC victory at ‘less than 3%’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Attorney John Deaton says there’s a 25% chance Ripple will see an outright win against the SEC, while rumors fly of a possible IPO.

item.title: Metropolitan Museum of Art to return $550K in donations from FTX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The agreement came on the back of “good faith, arm’s length negotiations” with FTX’s debtors, the museum said.

item.title: FTX lawsuits see crypto firms, influencers dial back endorsement deals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Some crypto influencers have been giving lucrative endorsement offers a hard pass after seeing what could happen if things end badly for the firm.

item.title: Web3 Gamer: GTA 6 crypto rumors, Dr Who/Sandbox, Thai tourist NFTs review
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Callan Quinn
item.description: GTA 6 crypto and NFT integration speculation mounts, Top Gear and Dr Who in The Sandbox, and Thailand’s rubbish NFT hunt for tourists.

item.title: Gate.io threatens legal action against rumor-mongers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Insolvency rumors surfaced after a series of events involving Multichain. Gate.io has denied any liquidity issues.

item.title: Bitcoin price chart flashes a bullish sign that could lead to breakouts in ADA, QNT, RNDR and RPL
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: BTC’s chart is beginning to look bullish, and ADA, QNT, RNDR and RPL could rally if Bitcoin price breaks out to the upside.

item.title: Atomic Wallet hack losses top $35M, on-chain sleuth reports
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Security teams are investigating the cause of the attack. Reports have surfaced of tokens being lost, transaction data being erased, and even entire crypto portfolios destroyed.

item.title: Cryptocurrency markets’ low volatility: A curse or an opportunity?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Francisco Rodrigues
item.description: The cryptocurrency market has been experiencing low volatility for the past two months, but does that mean investors should just sit and wait?

item.title: 5 free ChatGPT and generative AI courses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guneet Kaur
item.description: Level up your skills in language models and automation with free ChatGPT and generative AI courses.

item.title: Pro-XRP attorney’s phone hacked to promote LAW token
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Lawyer John Deaton alerted followers via his daughter’s account, urging people to report the hack as the XRP community responded, spreading awareness.

item.title: FTX debtors object to Genesis’ ‘critical’ claims estimate of ‘$0.00’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The FTX debtors alleged that the claim was filed “without any advance notice,” and they were not invited to participate in the mediation.

item.title: Elliptic integrates ChatGPT to bolster crypto risk detection
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Crypto risk management firm Elliptic believes ChatGPT will assist in scaling up intelligence and expose risks to crypto users that “they can’t get anywhere else.“

item.title: Warren’s alleged work with short-seller shows anti-crypto army heating up
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alex O’Donnell
item.description: Elizabeth Warren reportedly took advice from Wall Street short-seller Marc Cohodes, who cashed in on the collapse of Silvergate and Signature banks.

item.title: Musk’s alleged price manipulation, the Satoshi AI chatbot and more: Hodler’s Digest, May 28 – June 3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: DOGE investor lawsuit against Elon Musk, the Satoshi Nakamoto chatbot, and the ongoing crypto debanking worldwide.

item.title: Atomic Wallet exploited, users report loss of entire portfolios
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Several users have reported losses of crypto assets, claiming funds held on the Atomic Wallet app vanished.

item.title: Rapid growth in DeFi-focused Ethereum liquid staking derivatives platforms raises eyebrows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.category: Financialization of liquid staking token or LSDfi
item.description: Ether use in DeFi is down due to an uptick in staking, but rapid growth in LSDfi could be a bull market catalyst.

item.title: Brazilian crypto exchange Mercado Bitcoin licensed as payment provider: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: As a payment institution, MB Pay will enable certain digital banking services to the crypto exchange’s users in the country.

item.title: Is Biden’s controversial Bitcoin mining tax dead or set to rise from the ashes?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: References to the tax were removed from the U.S. debt bill, but that doesn’t mean it’s gone for good.

item.title: OpenAI commits $1M to support AI-driven cybersecurity initiatives
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: As criminals devise innovative ways to exploit AI for malicious intentions, OpenAI remains committed to equipping “defenders” with the necessary tools.

item.title: Uniswap scam alert: Fraudsters impersonate executives and create fake website
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Uniswap and its foundation have no association with the scam as efforts are being made to combat it.

item.title: MUFG to facilitate Japanese bank-backed stablecoins via Progmat Coin platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group hasn’t revealed what firms will be the first to utilize its platform; however, a handful of banks have reportedly opted for a separate stablecoin solution.

item.title: Net Bitcoin ATMs record an increase after 4 months of global downtrend
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: In the first four months of 2023, net crypto ATMs worldwide declined by 5,850.

item.title: Microsoft pens AI cloud computing deal with former Ethereum miner CoreWeave: CNBC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The reported deal comes just a few days after CoreWeave announced an additional $200 million worth of funding via an extended Series B funding round.

item.title: Crypto Biz: Six months on from FTX, Tether mines BTC, and Nvidia’s AI superchips
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: This week’s Crypto Biz looks at the crypto industry since the FTX collapse, Tether’s Bitcoin mining in Latin America, Tabi’s funding round and Nvidia’s artificial intelligence machines.

item.title: US lawmakers aim for crypto regulatory clarity with proposed bill putting the screws to SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The framework under the bill would allow certain tokens to qualify as digital commodities if they were decentralized and crack down on the SEC’s previous approach to crypto.

item.title: Arbitrum price soars after DeFi whale address resumes ARB accumulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: ARB’s price notched a double-digit gain after a popular DeFi whale address resumed buying the governance token, but is the rally sustainable?

item.title: Losses from crypto rug pulls outpaced DeFi exploits in May: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi tokens had a bullish last week of May, with most of the tokens recovering from two weeks of bearish pressure.

item.title: Privacy-focused Aleo blockchain gets new wallet as mainnet launch approaches
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The wallet developer also raised $4.5 million from Hack VC and other firms to further advance ZK-based enterprise solutions.

item.title: Evertas expands crypto insurance offerings to include mining and raises limits
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Crypto insurance underwriter Evertas will increase coverage limits to $420 million per policy while adding additional mining coverage.

item.title: Price analysis 6/2: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, SOL, DOT, LTC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and most major altcoins are witnessing subdued price action, indicating a lack of buying interest from the larger players.
